alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 10:59AM MST until January 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches, except less than an inch in the Mission Valley. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on Tuesday afternoon with potential for snow squalls. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Polson, Mission Valley, and Flathead Valley. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
